name: SpriteMultitouchJoystick
description: Multitouch joysticks can be used the same way as physical gamepads:
- Controls mapping for top-down movement and platformer characters
There are ready-to-use joysticks in the asset-store [multitouch joysticks pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=multitouch-joysticks-multitouch-joysticks).

events.comment: Reduce the speed to match the stick force.
Turn back at least as fast as it would stop.
Reduce the speed to match the stick force.
Turn back at least as fast as it would stop.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a button is pressed on a gamepad.
eventsFunctions.name: IsButtonPressed
eventsFunctions.sentence: Button _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ is pressed

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a button is released on a gamepad.
eventsFunctions.name: IsButtonReleased
eventsFunctions.sentence: Button _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ is released

eventsFunctions.description: Change a button state for a multitouch controller.
eventsFunctions.name: SetButtonState
eventsFunctions.sentence: Mark _PARAM2_ button as _PARAM3_ for multitouch controller _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the dead zone radius of a joystick. The deadzone is an area for which movement on sticks won't be taken into account (instead, the stick will be considered as not moved).
eventsFunctions.name: SetDeadZone
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the dead zone of multitouch joystick _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ to _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.description: Return the dead zone radius of a joystick. The deadzone is an area for which movement on sticks won't be taken into account (instead, the stick will be considered as not moved).
eventsFunctions.name: DeadZone
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change multitouch joystick _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ dead zone to _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.description: the direction index (left = 1, bottom = 1, right = 2, top = 3) for an angle (in degrees).
eventsFunctions.name: AngleTo4Way

eventsFunctions.description: the direction index (left = 1, bottom-left = 1... top-left = 7) for an angle (in degrees).
eventsFunctions.name: AngleTo8Way

eventsFunctions.description: Check if angle is in a given direction.
eventsFunctions.name: IsAngleIn4WayDirection

eventsFunctions.description: Check if angle is in a given direction.
eventsFunctions.name: IsAngleIn8WayDirection

eventsFunctions.description: Check if joystick is pushed in a given direction.
eventsFunctions.name: IsDirectionPushed4Way
eventsFunctions.sentence: Joystick _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ is pushed in direction _PARAM3_

events.comment: Make sure the joystick has moved from center

eventsFunctions.description: Check if joystick is pushed in a given direction.
eventsFunctions.name: IsDirectionPushed8Way
eventsFunctions.sentence: Joystick _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ is pushed in direction _PARAM3_

events.comment: Make sure the joystick has moved from center

eventsFunctions.description: the percentage the thumb has been pulled away from the joystick center (Range: 0 to 1).
eventsFunctions.name: JoystickForce

eventsFunctions.description: the force of multitouch contoller stick (from 0 to 1).
eventsFunctions.name: StickForce

eventsFunctions.description: Change the percentage the thumb has been pulled away from the joystick center (Range: 0 to 1).
eventsFunctions.name: SetJoystickForce
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the force of the joystick _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ to _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.description: Return the angle the joystick is pointing towards (Range: -180 to 180).
eventsFunctions.name: JoystickAngle

eventsFunctions.description: Return the angle the multitouch controller stick is pointing towards (Range: -180 to 180).
eventsFunctions.name: StickAngle

eventsFunctions.description: Change the angle the joystick is pointing towards (Range: -180 to 180).
eventsFunctions.name: SetJoystickAngle
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the angle of the joystick _PARAM2_ of multitouch controller _PARAM1_ to _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.description: Return the multitouch contoller stick force on X axis (from -1 at the left to 1 at the right).
eventsFunctions.name: StickForceX

eventsFunctions.description: Return the multitouch contoller stick force on Y axis (from -1 at the top to 1 at the bottom).
eventsFunctions.name: StickForceY

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a new touch has started on the right or left side of the screen.
eventsFunctions.fullName: New touch on a screen side
eventsFunctions.name: HasTouchStartedOnScreenSide
eventsFunctions.sentence: A new touch has started on the _PARAM2_ side of the screen on _PARAM1_'s layer

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Joystick that can be controlled by interacting with a touchscreen.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: MultitouchJoystick

events.comment: Move thumb back to center when not being pressed (acts like a spring on a real controller)

parameters: AngleBetweenPositions(Object.CenterX(), Object.CenterY(), TouchX(TouchId, Object.Layer(), 0), TouchY(TouchId, Object.Layer(), 0))
AngleBetweenPositions(Object.CenterX(), Object.CenterY(), TouchX(TouchId, Object.Layer(), 0), TouchY(TouchId, Object.Layer(), 0))
clamp(2 * DistanceBetweenPositions(Object.CenterX(), Object.CenterY(), TouchX(TouchId, Object.Layer(), 0), TouchY(TouchId, Object.Layer(), 0)) / Object.Width(), 0, 1)

eventsFunctions.description: the joystick force (from 0 to 1).
eventsFunctions.name: JoystickForce
